fields.name: DeletedSiteId
fields.description:
ARM resource ID of the deleted app. Example:
/subscriptions/{subId}/providers/Microsoft.Web/deletedSites/{deletedSiteId}

fields.name: RecoverConfiguration
fields.description: If true, deleted site configuration, in addition to content, will be restored.

fields.name: SnapshotTime
fields.description:
Point in time to restore the deleted app from, formatted as a DateTime string. 
If unspecified, default value is the time that the app was deleted.

fields.name: UseDRSecondary
fields.description: If true, the snapshot is retrieved from DRSecondary endpoint.
